# mbuf_setlen

**Function**

## Declaration

```swift
void mbuf_setlen(mbuf_t mbuf, size_t len);
```

## Parameters

- **mbuf**: The mbuf.
- **len**: The new length.

## Return Value

0 upon success otherwise the errno error.

## Discussion

Sets the length of data in this packet. Be careful to not set the length over the space available in the mbuf.
title: mbuf_setlen
